cards.rules_text:
[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
Each mutated creature you control has Ward {2}. [i](Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]

[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
Spells you cast with Help cost you {1} less to cast.

Hidden agenda [i](Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly choose a card name. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal that name.)[/i]
Creatures you control with the hidden name have Myriad. [i](Whenever that creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)[/i]

[i]Tempting offer[/i] — If this spell was cast from your hand, each opponent may copy it. For each opponent who does, you may copy it. 
Create two 1/1 blue Illusion creature tokens with “This creature gets +1/+0 for each other Illusion you control.”

When Shard Inspector enters, create a Shard token. [i](It's an enchantment with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]

[i](Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)[/i]
At the beginning of your first upkeep, create two Shard tokens. [i](They're enchantments with “{2}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]

Flying

Whenever an enchantment enters under your control, you may stun target creature.

[i](As a Cause enters, choose an opponent to defend it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then the victor may cast it transformed.)[/i]
When this battle enters, you may sacrifice a creature or enchantment. If you do, exile up to one target non-token creature controlled by a player not defending this battle.

When this battle enters, create two Shard tokens.
[i]Defense — [/i]{2}: Create a 1/1 white Monk creature token with prowess. 
When this battle is defeated, the victor draws two cards.
UR## — Not Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target permanent.

When this battle enters, create two 1/1 white bird creature tokens with flying.
When this battle is defeated, the victor may create a 1/1 white bird creature tokens with flying and then populate twice. [i](To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)[/i]

When this battle enters, choose target creature you control. Whenever it attacks this turn, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of it. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.
When this battle is defeated, the victor may create a 6/6 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

When this battle enters, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
[i]Defense — 2[/i]: Create a 0/2 red Dragon Egg creature token.
When this battle is defeated, the victor may exile any number of creatures they control, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control.

When this battle enters, destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.
[i]Defense — [/i]{2}: Create 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
When this battle is defeated, the victor gains control of target creature the defending player controls.

[i](As a Cause enters, choose an opponent to defend it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then the victor may cast it transformed.)[/i]
When this battle enters, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put two +1/+1 counter on each Fractal you control.

When this battle enters, each opponent sacrifices a creature or discards a card.
[i]Defense — [/i]{2}: Create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach. 
When this battle is defeated, the victor may put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under their control.

When this battle enters, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a non-land card. This battle deals damage to target creature equal to that card's mana value. Put all revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. 
When this battle is defeated, the victor may exile the top card of each players library face down. They may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

[i](As a Cause enters, choose an opponent to defend it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then you and the victor may cast a copy of it transformed.)[/i]
When this battle enters, create three 2/2 black zombie creature tokens. For each opponent, goad up to one target creature that opponent controls.

Gift a Treasure [i](You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they create a Treasure token before its other effects. It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
Torch deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If a gift was promised, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1.
If a permanent dealt damage by Torch would die this turn, exile it instead.

Defender
Whenever you help cast a spell, draw a card.
Whenever your opponent helps you cast a spell, they scry 1.

Trample 
At the beginning of your end step, if it attacked this turn, Battle Fighter deals 1 damage to up to one target battle protected by an opponent.
Return up to one target non-battle card from their graveyard to your hand.
You may cast the exiled creature without paying its mana cost.

[i](You defend this promise. Others may attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then you and the victor may each cast a copy of it transformed.)[/i]
When you or a battle you protect is attacked you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 0/2 red Dragon Egg creature token with defender and “When this token dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and ‘{R}: This token gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'”

Enchant creature.
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
